tool_description: Quick and Easy API for Threads, a Twitter-like app developed by Meta.
name: Meta Threads 2023
title: Meta Threads 2023

api_list.name: Thread/Post Likers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meta-threads-2023.p.rapidapi.com/thread/likers/3141002295235099165"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meta-threads-2023.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://meta-threads-2023.p.rapidapi.com/thread/likers/{thread_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meta-threads-2023.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
